p: Participants for this experiment consisted of 67 males ( n = 30) and females ( n = 37) between the ages of 18 and 38 years old ( M = 20.373, SD = 3.789), with normal or corrected-to-normal vision. They were recruited primarily through undergraduate psychology classes on Northern Michigan University’s campus, receiving course credit for their participation. Informed consent was obtained from participants before beginning the experiment, and the research protocol was approved by the Institutional Review Board of Northern Michigan University.
